snippet: Energy prices and a squeeze on disposable household incomes remain concerns of the Bank of England, which kept its main interest rate at a record low.
abstract: Bank of England keeps its main interest rate unchanged at a record low of 0.5 percent, and keeps its bond purchasing program at 325 billion pounds ($516 billion), as expected.
lead_paragraph: Energy prices and a squeeze on disposable household incomes remain concerns of the Bank of England, which kept its main interest rate at a record low.

headline.seo: Bank of England Leaves Low Rate Unchanged
headline.main: British Central Bank Keeps Rate Steady
headline.print_headline: British Central Bank Keeps Rate Steady
